p: A Simple Lattice Mixture Design was applied to find out the interactive effects of antioxidant activity from the EOs extracted from A. graveolens, T. vulgaris and C. sativum. The response variable was determined by FRAP and ABTS antioxidant activity assays. Mixture design experiments were conceived and analyzed by means of Design-Expert 10 software (Trial key: 2182-0638-8336-EVAL). The entire 13 mixtures are shown in Table 1.
